entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
